summary: Major Howell Brady arrives in Indian Territory in hopes of recruiting peaceful, relocated Seminoles to help the army fight rampaging Kiowas.
cast: Maureen O'Hara|Jeff Chandler|John McIntire|Suzan Ball|Noah Beery Jr.|Charles Drake|Henry Brandon|Dennis Weaver|Jay Silverheels|Jim Bannon|Stephen Wyman|Bradford Jackson|Emile Avery|Dee Carroll|Dick Fortune|Lance Fuller|Whitey Hughes|Kermit Maynard|Ezelle Poule|Darla Ridgeway|Jack Tornek|Bill Ward|Roy Whaley|Sally Yarnell
keywords: indian territory|u.s. cavalry|seminole indian|based on true story|taming of the shrew
title: Asalto al fuerte Clark
